hero.title: Expose the hidden hotel estate, the money behind it, and where the pressure lands.
hero.summary: This site puts the strongest public evidence first: hotel secrecy, unresolved ownership chains, supplier exposure, and local concentration. The official stock-flow logic sits underneath that front page so the numbers stay honest.

angles.title: Hotels still drive the bill
angles.body: In the first seven months of 2024/25, hotels housed 35% of people in asylum accommodation but drove 76% of contract cost.

angles.title: The hidden estate is part of the story
angles.body: The government publishes national hotel counts, but a full public named-site list still has to be assembled from councils, FOIs, and public documents.

angles.title: Backlog pressure still feeds accommodation demand
angles.body: 64,426 people were still waiting for an initial decision at the end of December 2025.
